start.message: Hello, this is Bitcoin rating bot, i'll give provide you with information about bitcoin rating for different times and different currency. To know bot options please type command /commands

commands.description: Available options and commands for bot.

today.description: Shows you bitcoin price for today. Default currency is USD.

yesterday.description: Shows you bitcoin price for yesterday. Default currency is USD.

period.description: Shows you bitcoin price for yesterday. Default currency is USD.

currency.description: Shows you bitcoin price for selected currency. Just put your currency insted of '<CURRENCY>'. You can combine this option with other any date option. Default date is today date.
